keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will protect front line health and education services from swingeing Tory cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for schools and Sure Start centres
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will fight to stop Tory cuts to children's early childhood services through schools and Sure Start centres.
Labour is putting money into the banks, imposing new rules on lending, protecting savings, banning extreme bonuses, and making the banks repay the UK for the public investment.
Older people deserve a fair share of the nation's prosperity.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to be the Labour Party candidate for West Suffolk as I believe in the principles of the Labour Party - that we all have a responsibility to help those who cannot support themselves. I am passionate about my work in education and with older people. I'm honoured to be in the finals of councillor of the year and will use my council experience to help me represent you more effectively.

endorsements.endorsement: As the previous Labour Party candidate, I am very happy to endorse Ohid. I know he would make an excellent MP, working hard for this constituency, and continuing the values of tolerance, integrity and compassion for all.

images.caption: Ohid Ahmed with an older woman and gentleman, caption reads: Ohid chats to local residents.
Ohid Ahmed with Joanna Bacon, caption reads: I support Ohid Ahmed.
Ohid Ahmed with another man in a suit, both smiling. Background includes a historical building.
